item.title: Using a plex server for media streaming
item.description: Using a plex server for media streaming What is a plex server? Plex is a client-server media player system and software suite comprising two main components. The Plex Media Server desktop application runs on Windows, macOS, and Linux-compatibles including some types of NAS devices. The server desktop application organizes video, audio, and photos from a user’s collections and from online services, enabling the players to access and stream the contents.
